_desc.NAICS_DESCRIPTION: Other Grocery and Related Products Merchant Wholesalers

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
Certified Grocers is committes to safety for employees, the public, and the environmental and strives to meet all appropriate federal, state, and local environmental and safety regulations. Certified Grocers is located at 6800 Santa Fe Drive, Hodgkins, Illionis. The facility is a warehouse for produce and meat products as well as some consumer productes.. The produce and meat products are kept refrigerated. Anhydrous ammonia has been used as a refrigerant. Therefrigeration system contains ammonia in various states including liquid, vapor, and gas in various vessels, compressors, condensers, pipes, and evaporators.                                                                                                                                                                          Certified Grocers complies with the Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) Process Safety Management of Hazardous Chemicals (the PSM standard) to reduce the possibility of accidental release of highly hazardous chemicals. The PSM standard (29 CFR 1910.119) isdesignated to protect employees by preventing or minimizing the consequences of catastrophic releases of toxic, reactive, flammable or explosive chemicals. The PSM standradr addresses the following 12  elements of the prevention program:                                                                                                                                       

> Employye Participation
>Process Safety Informatiom
>Process Hazard Analysis
>Operating Procedures
>Training
>Mechanical Integrity
>Management of Change
>Pre-Start up Safety Review
>Compliance Audit
>Incident Investigation
>Employee Participation
>Hot Work Pwrmit
>Contractor Safety

Certified Grocers has an emergency action plan.
